title: Develop a prototype IOT BLE Dongle
snippet:
I want to develop a prototype to grab information from a medical apparel like as on the attached file.

This apparel write files on a SD card and i want to sync this files on my phone.
I thought to develop a small breadboard with inside a BLE chip and the program to read and copy the files on my phone.

Result : a custom breadboard with BLE chip and a sdcard soldiered and a battery.
